channel.title: Darkmoon Faire on From Draenor With Love
channel.description: Recent content in Darkmoon Faire on From Draenor With Love

item.title: Darkmoon Foul
item.description: Seriously, does no one else at the Faire raise an eyebrow at the fact that each month, Kerri Hicks is collecting thousands of bloody ears? I mean, the icon is an ear, and Blizzard has a tendency to encourage ear-collecting, ever since Diablo. What the heck is she DOING with all of these bloody trophies?? It seems such a disproportionate reward, too â€“ you bring back proof of 250(!) kills and you get 10 little tickets.
